itunes:title: APR 21 2022 –   WHO HAS SOVEREIGNTY, THE PEOPLE OR CORPORATIONS?
title: APR 21 2022 –   WHO HAS SOVEREIGNTY, THE PEOPLE OR CORPORATIONS?
description:
Governor Jared Polis invites Disney to move to Colorado for ‘asylum’ after Florida Senate passes a bill eliminating Disney’s special tax district. All of this as Saudi Crown Prince Mohammad Bin Salman says he will not release more oil into U.S. markets amid declining U.S.-Saudi relations. Meanwhile, Johnny Depp testifies in a defamation trial against ex-wife Amber Heard after she wrote an op-ed on her personal experience with sexual violence in the Washington Post, and Alec Baldwin claims he has been ‘exonerated’ as Rust producers are fined nearly $137,000 over the death of Halyna Hutchins. 


Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


To get $150 off each 3-month supply of ‘My Patriot Supply’ go to PrepareWithPOSO.com and use promo code POSO 


To save on MyPillow go to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO


For more on Turning Point USA's Socialism Sucks series, ‘China: The World’s Loan Shark’ go to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6s4L1Q5yN04
content:encoded:
Governor Jared Polis invites Disney to move to Colorado for ‘asylum’ after Florida Senate passes a bill eliminating Disney’s special tax district. All of this as Saudi Crown Prince Mohammad Bin Salman says he will not release more oil into U.S. markets amid declining U.S.-Saudi relations. Meanwhile, Johnny Depp testifies in a defamation trial against ex-wife Amber Heard after she wrote an op-ed on her personal experience with sexual violence in the Washington Post, and Alec Baldwin claims he has been ‘exonerated’ as Rust producers are fined nearly $137,000 over the death of Halyna Hutchins. 


Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec
